font-lovers-lettering-brushes.install_instructions:
Installing Procreate Brushes

Procreate brushes are some of a growing group of tools on Creative Market that work solely on a mobile device. Procreate is an app for iPad only, so Creative Market’s Procreate brushes will only work on an iPad with Procreate app installed. These brushes are amazing tools to use with your mobile stylus that will help you start sketching, lettering, and drawing in a variety of effects.

Install Guide

Note: These brushes were designed specifically for use in Procreate (not Illustrator, or Photoshop), so they are only compatible with Procreate. An Apple Pencil was used to create and test all of the brushes. For this reason, I’m unable to guarantee the same results with other 3rd party styluses. If you’d like to test some of my free brushes for compatibility, they can be found at http://TuesdayTribe.com
font-lovers-lettering-brushes.intro_description:
Lettering Lovers

If you love lettering, vectorizing your lettering or preparing your lettering for font making, this brush set was made for you!

This custom Procreate lettering brush set includes 20 unique lettering brushes. 8 of those brushes were specifically designed for vectorization in Adobe Illustrator (check out the preview image above to see em in action!).

This pack is filled with 15 unique, metallic accented textures, each in 3 colorways for a total of 45 textures! 15 Isolated gold textures are also included to add a punch of shine to any colored or textured background. All ink and gold textures come as high res (300dpi) transparent pngs and are sized at least 2000px on their longest side. This makes them beautiful and crisp on all common print + web applications!

Here’s what’s included:

  • 20 unique lettering brushes
  • 8 of those brushes were specifically designed for vectorization in Adobe Illustrator
  • Pressure sensitive brushes perfect for faux-ligraphy

Brush settings vary from pressure sensitive brushes perfect for faux-ligraphy (check out the signature marker + jittery ink brushes!), to mono weight brushes (see the mono marker + round marker), to brushes perfect for sketching out your lettering (hello, pencil sketch and smooth pencil!). Whatever style you’re inspired by or plan to bring to life, this comprehensive, diverse set will give you plenty of options to make it happen.

seo.title: Font Lovers Procreate Lettering Brushes
seo.desc: This custom procreate lettering brush set includes 20 unique lettering brushes. 8 of those were specifically designed for vectorization in Adobe Illustrator

Whatever style you’re inspired by or plan to bring to life, this comprehensive, diverse set will give you plenty of options to make it happen.

——

To see more Procreate artwork using these brushes, find me on Instagram! https://instagram.com/everytuesday

You can also find me every Tuesday sharing a new design, Procreate or lettering tutorial on YouTube: https://youtube.com/everytues

If you’re new to Procreate, check out my free course, Procreate for Beginners! https://every-tuesday.com/procreate-for-beginners

——

Requirements:

  • iPad Pro
  • Apple Pencil
  • Procreate

These brushes were designed specifically for use in Procreate (not Illustrator, or Photoshop), so they are only compatible with Procreate. An Apple Pencil was used to create and test all of the brushes. For this reason, I’m unable to guarantee the same results with other 3rd party styluses. skinny-jeans.name: Skinny Jeans Font Trio

features.title: Script style
features.description: 27 ligatures and alternate, extra large looped y and g for more unique, hand lettered looks.

features.title: Symbols font
features.description: Over 50 unique, hand drawn doodles and illustrations. A different symbol is assigned to ever uppercase and lowercase standard character, plus numbers 0-9.

features.title: Multilingual support
features.description: Western European Languages for both Script + Caps styles. A full font previewer is available here for testing any characters.

features.title: Webfont available
features.description: For uses of Skinny Jeans that *are* intended for sale or to be used for business purposes, please see the Extended License, which also includes the Skinny Jeans webfonts.

skinny-jeans.install_instructions:
Installing Fonts

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

Install Guide

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: When a font is installed on your computer, it can be used with any program that allows you to create text. Fonts will work in Microsoft Office applications, Adobe software, and almost any other program with a text editor.
skinny-jeans.intro_description:
Fashion Forward

Introducing Skinny Jeans: a fashion-forward font perfect for high impact headlines, energetic engagements and personality-driven branding, social media posts and messaging.

Skinny Jeans includes 3 fonts: a script style, all caps and symbols font. All styles were designed to pair perfectly together, for super quick layouts and eye-catching outcomes.

What’s included with the Skinny Jeans Font Trio:

  • A Script style with 27 ligatures and alternates, extra large looped y and g for more unique, hand lettered looks
  • An all caps style designed to pair perfectly with Skinny Jeans Script
  • A symbols font with over 50 unique, hand drawn doodles and illustrations. A different symbol is assigned to ever uppercase and lowercase standard character, plus numbers 0-9.
  • All symbols are included as an ai + eps file for versions of Adobe Illustrator, CS3 or newer for your convenience

Multilingual support is included for Western European Languages for both Script + Caps styles. Please test your characters in the font previewer below before purchase.

OTFs of each style are included for the full font trio. (Need access to TTFs? There’s a link included in the info text file)

Enjoy!

seo.title: Skinny Jeans Font Trio
seo.desc: Skinny Jeans includes 3 fonts: a script style, all caps and symbols font. All styles were designed to pair perfectly together, for super quick layouts and eye-catching outcomes.

glitz-glam-kit.name: Glitz + Glam Kit

images.alt: Glitz and Glam foil brushes in photoshop
Glitz and Glam foil vector elements
Glitz and Glam foil texture kit for photoshop

features.title: Digital Foil and Glitter Kit
features.description: Quickly and easily (with just one click!) apply digital foil and glitter textures to typography, vector elements and confetti brush styles.

features.title: Ultra High Rez Images
features.description: All textures were created at 2000px x 2000px @300dpi RGB for maximum, high resolution use. Be sure to click on the preview images above to see full details of everything included!

features.title: Excellent Support
features.description: Please view the video overview for easy installation and quick usage! If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact me, I'm happy to help!

features.title: Dynamic Brush Styles
features.description: The kit comes with 12 unique + dynamic pressure sensitive photoshop brushes. Each brush is realistic with scatter and rotations as you paint with the brush.

glitz-glam-kit.install_instructions:
Installing Textures

If you are using a desktop/laptop:

These textures can be used on desktops, laptops & tablets. When using them on a desktop or laptop computer, simply save the downloaded zip file after purchase to your hard drive. Unzip and place the file in your design program of choice.

If you are using a tablet:

Install Guide

Note: These textures are very high-rez, slower iPads may see some slower screen performance issues.
glitz-glam-kit.intro_description:
Glitterize your layouts

Punch up your designs and create impressive, digital foil and glitterized layouts with the Glitz + Glam Kit!

Easily apply foil + glitter layer styles to typography, vector elements, brushes and more with one click (see the video in the preview for proof ;)!

All textures were created at 2000px x 2000px @300dpi RGB for maximum, high resolution use. Be sure to click on the preview images above to see full details of everything included!

This kit is packed with:

  • 12 unique foil + glitter layer styles in 3 metallics: gold, silver and black (36 total)
  • 12 dynamic confetti brush styles
  • 100% Seamless pattern files for all textures (36 in all)
  • 100% Seamless, high res jpgs of every texture (36 in all)
  • Over 50 vector elements as an ai, eps + psd file for CS3 or newer

These textures can also be used as *transparent* pngs within Procreate! Click the install instructions tab above to learn how to get them working.

seo.title: Glitz + Glam Kit: Punch up your designs with digital foil and glitterized styles
seo.desc: Punch up your designs and create impressive, digital foil and glitterized layouts with the Glitz + Glam Kit! This kit is packed with tons of elements to make your designs pop.
